trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around April 22nd 2009
Summary: It was a large dark hovering circle.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at home and went outside to smoke I saw a strange dark circle in the sky just below the cloud cover at first I thought it was a balloon but it did not move at all it just hoverd I watched it for about 5 mins then ran inside to grab my camera when I came back out it was still in the same spot which I thought was odd my cameras lense is not so good so even on max zoom it just looks like a spot of dust. I continued watching it for a few more mins the a large commercial airplane flew by and the shape still did not move. I went in to call my husband and when I came back it had vanished. I am not sure what it was and there were no news reports which there usually are although I dont belive they are related our power went out the same night to 685 customers and was out for 1 hr 15 min in my area only. To be honest it frightend me imensly as I said I called my husband and told him I thought I was loosing my mind I was very paranoid for the rest of the day untill he got home.
